title: Guard (Deadman Mode)

properties.name: description
properties.value: There are unique level 1337 guards in Deadman Mode who are able to hit up to 30 with a very high accuracy (melee and Ice Barrage). They are capable of Tele Blocking and negating Prayer completely. These guards will kill anyone who enters a safe zone with a PK skull instantly. Getting killed by these guards will lead to a 10 percent loss of experience in protected skills, in addition to the regular penalties.

There are unique level 1337 guards in Deadman Mode who are able to hit up to 30 with a very high accuracy (melee and Ice Barrage). They are capable of Tele Blocking and negating Prayer completely. These guards will kill anyone who enters a safe zone with a PK skull instantly. Getting killed by these guards will lead to a 10 percent loss of experience in protected skills, in addition to the regular penalties.

The guards are much different in Deadman: Reborn than the normal Deadman modes. Instead they will attack with ranged every game cycle, with its damage starting at 1/5th of the player's max hitpoints, increasing by 2 damage with each attack.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The combat level is a reference to leetspeak.
  • When casting Monster Examine, it is revealed that their real combat level is 665.

There are unique level 1337 '''guards''' in [[Deadman Mode]] who are able to hit up to 30 with a very high accuracy ([[melee]] and [[Ice Barrage]]). They are capable of [[Tele Block]]ing and negating [[Prayer]] completely. These guards will kill anyone who enters a safe zone with a [[Skull (status)|PK skull]] instantly. Getting killed by these guards will lead to a 10 percent loss of experience in protected skills, in addition to the regular penalties.

The guards are much different in [[Deadman: Reborn]] than the normal Deadman modes. Instead they will attack with [[ranged]] every [[game cycle]], with its damage starting at 1/5th of the player's max [[hitpoint]]s, increasing by 2 damage with each attack.
